excerpt.rendered: At our Buena Vista outpost, a unique full-day rafting and rock-climbing experience awaits. Your experienced guides will coach you as you defy gravity on the crags and cliffs above the Arkansas River Valley and then splash your way down some of the best rapids in the country on the iconic Arkansas River. Options for all ability levels means we can help you put together the perfect package for everyone in your party.
